@Generated(value="org.openapitools.codegen.languages.JavaClientCodegen", date="2024-09-20T18:59:14.159238432Z[Etc/UTC]", comments="Generator version: 7.8.0") public class OAuthCredentialsClient extends Object implements Serializable
OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect Client object > **Note:** You must complete client registration with the IdP Authorization Server for your Okta IdP instance to obtain client credentials.
